public.title: Technical Projects
public.subtitle: Showcasing expertise in Data Science, Machine Learning, and Big Data Engineering

items.title: Autonomous Drone Navigation
items.description: A comprehensive system enabling drones to navigate complex indoor environments without GPS. The solution integrates SLAM for mapping and a custom CNN for real-time object detection.
items.problem_statement: Commercial drones often struggle in GPS-denied environments like warehouses or tunnels, leading to collisions and loss of assets.
items.architecture: Used a monocular camera feed processed by a Jetson Nano. The stack includes ROS2 for message passing, ORB-SLAM3 for localization, and a MobileNetV3 SSD for obstacle detection.

items.title: Large Scale Sentiment Analysis
items.description: An end-to-end data pipeline processing massive streams of Twitter/X data to gauge public sentiment regarding financial market trends.
items.problem_statement: Analyzing millions of tweets in real-time to detect market-moving sentiment is computationally expensive and requires low-latency architecture.
items.architecture: Ingestion via Kafka, streaming processing with Apache Spark Structured Streaming, and analysis using a fine-tuned BERT model. Results stored in Cassandra.

items.title: Medical Image Segmentation
items.description: Developing a U-Net based architecture to assist radiologists in identifying tumors in MRI scans with high precision.
items.problem_statement: Manual segmentation of MRI scans is time-consuming and prone to inter-observer variability.
items.architecture: Standard U-Net architecture with residual blocks. Trained on the BRATS dataset using heavy data augmentation to handle class imbalance.
